headline: Vistra Marks Next Step in Acquisition of Gas Generation Fleet with Approval from the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission
summary: Vistra (NYSE: VST) today announced it has received regulatory approval from the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) for its previously announced acquisition of certain subsidiaries owning seven modern natural gas generation facilities from Lotus Infrastructure Partners. The transaction remains on track to close this quarter or Q1 2026.

headline: Vistra to Report Third Quarter Results on Nov. 6, 2025
summary: Vistra (NYSE: VST) plans to report its third quarter 2025 financial and operating results on Thursday, Nov. 6, 2025, during a live conference call and webcast beginning at 10 a.m. ET (9 a.m. CT).

headline: A Fresh Look at Vistra (VST) Valuation After Strong Share Price Momentum
summary: Vistra (VST) stock has drawn some attention lately as investors look at its recent performance. The company has seen solid gains over the past year, and its strong financials have sparked interest in how it is positioned in the current market. See our latest analysis for Vistra. Vistra’s share price momentum has been strong, highlighted by a year of robust gains and renewed optimism about the power sector. With a current share price of $201.51 and a standout one-year total shareholder return...
